thread.title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan teaser

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan teaser
text:
The much-awaited teaser of Naanum Rowdy Dhaan, directed by Vignesh Shivan has been released for the fans. Produced by Dhanush's production house, the film has Vijay Sethupathi and Nayanthara playing the lead roles with Anirudh composing the music. The teaser has given a sneak-peek into the film and Vijay Sethupathi's character of aa aspiring don. The film also stars Parthiban, RJ Balaji and Naan Kadavul Rajendran in pivotal roles. Seems like Naanum Rowdy Dhaan will be hilarious comedy.
Check out the teaser:
